mpic++    -O3 -Wall -std=c++11   CMakeFiles/uniCAPSlave.dir/task_tracker.cpp.o  -o uniCAPSlave -rdynamic task_tracker/libTaskTracker.a computing/libComputing.a common/libCommon.a storage/libStorage.a gen/libGen.a /usr/local/lib/libthrift.so /usr/local/lib/libglog.so -Wl,-Bstatic -lleveldb -Wl,-Bdynamic -lsnappy -lhdfs -lboost_system -lboost_filesystem -lboost_thread -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
